commit message: Fixed UI error. Had to do with the 'modified star.'

Menu Search option, small bugs

Mainly tired to fix the intent problem when opening multiple files from desktop icons. I was unable to do it and am chalking it up to a bug in Android.

Bug fixes and search in menu

Had troubles fixing opening with intents if you open with intent A then B then back to A, it stays in state B not continuing to A.

I think this is an optimization in Android that has gone wrong.

Tablet support.
However, I do not have an actual tablet to test this. The emulator showed promising results.
Feature: check for externally modified file
